Such things are not right, they are a cruelty and in· justice and injury from the soul to the body, its faithful slave, and they bring down, as in his case they too truly did, their own certain and specific retribution. A man who did not feel keenly might have preached; aman whose whole nature was torn, shattered, and astonished as his was, had in a high sense no right so to use himself ; and when too late he opened his eyes to this. It was part of our old Scottish severe unsparing character—calm to coldness outside, humiug to fierceness, tendet to agony within.
